summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganThe Apple Jam Scrub Foam from Chasin' Rabbits is an exfoliating cleanser for smooth, hydrated skin infused with natural apple extract. This formulation draws out impurities, unclogs pores, and deeply cleanses skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and intensely hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe sugar-based formula provides gentle yet effective exfoliation, helping to refine skin texture and promote a radiant glowThis cleanser is accompanied by a refreshing light apple scentKey IngredientsApple Vineger Extract - balancing skin pH, gentle exfoliation, and potentially reducing acne and hyperpigmentation, due to its antimicrobial and antioxidant propertiesAHA, BHA. PHA - reduces fine lines, improves skin texture, and treats uneven skin textureItem 2645059How To UseSqueeze A Proper Amount Onto Your Hand. Gently Rub Face And Massage On Your Skin. Rinse With Lukewarm Water.IngredientsGlycerin, Water, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cellulose, Coconut Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Sorbitol, Sodium Isethionate, Citric Acid, Betaine, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Chloride, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance, Phaseolus Radiatus Seed Powder, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fiber, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Cocoyl Apple Amino Acids, Coptis Japonica Root Extract, Malt Extract, Hexylene Glycol, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Gluconolactone, Salicylic Acid, Propanediol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Vinegar, Xylitol, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Glucose, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Flower Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Guaiazulene.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Squeeze A Proper Amount Onto Your Hand. Gently Rub Face And Massage On Your Skin. Rinse With Lukewarm Water.
